name: Tyrian 2000
overview: Flying carrot ships, pilotable dragons, banana warfare, and Microsol trying to turn Ixmucane Deliani into a sun, all in the palm of your hands! The Game Boy Color version of Tyrian 2000 would have been the first time Tyrian ventured off of home PCs. However, it ultimately was cancelled in favor of the Game Boy Advance version, which met the same fate later on.
